title: Bobby And Amy’s Son Set Up A Dance Class + Jimmie Allen and Abby Anderson Stop By
itunes:title: Bobby And Amy’s Son Set Up A Dance Class + Jimmie Allen and Abby Anderson Stop By
description:
Amy sets up a dance lesson for Bobby and her son and then brags on Bobby to the dance instructor. Jimmie Allen and Abby Anderson stop by the studio to perform "Shallow" from the movie "A Star Is Born". Plus, show members compete in "Easy Trivia".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
